com.github.katjahahn.tools.visualizer

Class VisualizerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.tools.visualizer.VisualizerBuilder

  • public class VisualizerBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a visualizer based on properties like the height of the image.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP
      The default of the reduced size on each side of pixels that lie on top of others.
      static int DEFAULT_FILE_WIDTH
      The default width of the file shown is 300
      static int DEFAULT_HEIGHT
      The default image and file height is 600
      static int DEFAULT_LEGEND_WIDTH
      The default width of the legend is 200
      static int DEFAULT_PIXEL_SIZE
      The default size of one pixel-block in the image is 5
      static boolean DEFAULT_PIXELATED
      The default for pixelating the image is false .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VisualizerBuilder() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Visualizer build()
      Build the visualizer with all settings made.
      VisualizerBuilder setAdditionalGap(int additionalGap)
      Sets the reduced size on each side of square pixels that lie on top of others.
      VisualizerBuilder setBytesPerPixel(int bytes, long fileLength)
      Sets the number of file bytes that are represented by one square pixel.
      VisualizerBuilder setColor(ColorableItem key, java.awt.Color color)
      Sets the color for a colorable item.
      VisualizerBuilder setFileWidth(int fileWidth)
      Sets the width of the PE file representation in (real) pixels.
      VisualizerBuilder setHeight(int height)
      Sets the height of the resulting image, thus also the height of the PE file representation.
      VisualizerBuilder setLegendWidth(int legendWidth)
      Sets the width of the legend.
      VisualizerBuilder setPixelated(boolean pixelated)
      Sets pixelated mode, meaning every square pixel in the image has borders if true.
      VisualizerBuilder setPixelSize(int pixelSize)
      Sets the length and width of one square pixel.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP

        public static final int DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP
        The default of the reduced size on each side of pixels that lie on top of others. Imagine it like a transparent border. Value is 1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_PIXELATED

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_PIXELATED
        The default for pixelating the image is false .

        A pixelated image will have borders for every pixel-block.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • setBytesPerPixel

        public VisualizerBuilder setBytesPerPixel(int bytes,
                                 long fileLength)
        Sets the number of file bytes that are represented by one square pixel. The height of the image is changed accordingly.
        Parameters:
        bytes - bytes to be set per pixel
        fileLength - the length of the file
        Returns:
        this VisualizerBuilder
